desc: I need a one page marketing slick to highlight the key points of information below. Logo's and more can be found at midatlanticfirst.org. My goal is to have a one page (2 sided design) that I can approach investors with and get them to commit 10k to our project.Mid-Atlantic FIRST Coalition Enthusiasts,Thank you for your continued participation in our coalition activities! As you are aware, the need to formalize the coalition was driven by several incidents, such as Hurricane Sandy and Winter Storm Jonas. These events highlighted the need for a way to assess and aggregate—sometimes confusing and contradictory—information across multiple state, county, and city jurisdictions and disseminate it through multiple channels available to e xxx. We are excited at the progress we have made to secure strong partnerships between the coalition and key public-sector agencies with the goal to understand the capabilities each side possesses to respond/share information during wide-scale and local emergency events.We have engaged partners at all levels to include the DC Homeland Emergency Management Agency, Metropolitan Washington Council of Governments, Federal Emergency Management Agency, Maryland Emergency Management Agency, DC and Virginia Fusion Centers and many other local EOCs.Our outreach efforts have produced benefits to our membership including:·        U.S. Department of Treasury hosted tabletop exercise/workshop (September 14th)·        Participation in development/planning efforts for the Business Emergency Operations Center (BEOC) led by the MWCOG. The Mid-Atlantic FIRST coalition will be a key member of this effort.·        Tri-sector tabletop exercise (October)·        Attendance to and participation in development/planning of the Maryland Emergency Management Agency (MEMA) fall private/public scenario based exerciseWe are excited to begin this next phase of Mid-Atlantic FIRST coalition development in which we begin to formalize our organizational structure and governance. We have full time Director that is committed to building and maintaining a sustainable regional coalition.   Initially this directorship is funded by FS-ISAC .   Our next goal is to look at building our Founding Board of Directors and eventually setting dues that will enable our coalition to become self-funded. The topic has been discussed at several small group strategy meetings as well as our monthly member call. To launch this phase, we are introducing an opportunity for you to become one of the “founding member investors” in the coalition.As a founding member, you would contribute a one-time investment ranging from 10K (Up) to secure a spot on our Founding Board of Directors and assist in the development of a dues structure for the larger membership base. Below are a few of the highlights we felt would be advantageous for our founding members:Founding Partner/Investor Benefits:·        Seat on board of directors – Drive strategy and direction·        Sliding scale % reduction in dues over 5 years (25,20,15,10,5)·        Early access/registration to training/events·        Recognition on public-facing website as founding partnerPlease take a moment to review this important opportunity and feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We are putting our founding member board in place in 2017 with the expectation of full member dues going into place during 2018.We know that maintaining a strong resilient workforce is more important than ever. I’d love to discuss this opportunity. Would you be available to meet either in person (lunch) or via conference call sometime next week?Thank you! We look forward to your investment in the success of the Mid Atlantic FIRST Coalition.
title: Design a Flyer (one page marketing slick)

desc: ABOUT ALEXIONAlexion is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on developing and delivering life-changing therapies for patients with devastating and rare diseases.Patients with these life-threatening diseases often have no effective treatment options, and they and their families suffer with little hope. Our goal is to deliver medical breakthroughs where none currently exist. We are driven because we know people's lives depend on our work.Alexion was established in the U.S. in 1992 and became a public company in 1996 (NASDAQ: ALXN). We were added to the NASDAQ-100 Index in 2011 and to the Standard & Poor's 500 Index in 2012. Alexion’s global headquarters are currently in New Haven, Conn. In September 2017, the Company announced that it would relocate its headquarters to Boston, Mass., by mid-2018 and that New Haven would serve as the Company’s Center of Excellence for its world-class complement research and process development teams. Alexion's employees around the world serve patients in approximately 50 countries.OUR BREAKTHROUGH PRODUCTSAlexion developed Soliris® (eculizumab), the world's first approved terminal complement inhibitor, for the treatment of patients with paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) and atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome (aHUS) two life-threatening, ultra-rare disorders caused by uncontrolled complement activation. Soliris is also approved in the European Union for the treatment of patients with refractory generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG) who are anti-acetylcholine receptor (AChR) antibody-positive. Marketing applications for Soliris for the treatment of this ultra-rare subset of MG patients have been accepted for review in the U.S. and Japan.Alexion also has two highly innovative enzyme replacement therapies for patients with life-threatening and ultra-rare metabolic disorders—Strensiq® (asfotase alfa) for patients with hypophosphatasia (HPP) and Kanuma® (sebelipase alfa) for patients with lysosomal acid lipase deficiency (LAL-D).OUR FUTUREAlexion’s ambition is to be the global leader in rare diseases by leveraging our 20+ years of expertise in complement biology and our capabilities in hematology, nephrology, neurology and metabolic disorders to bring additional life-changing therapies to patients.
title: http://www.alexion.com/

Thank you!SEO Job Specialist Job Requirements:1.	SEO/SEM expert to provide on page and off-page optimization.2.	Maximize the volume of inbound organic traffic from search engines (Google and Bing).-Experience in building inbound organic search traffic and improving SERPs3.	Experience with Google and Bing’s services, including Analytics and Webmaster Tools (e.g, Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)4.	Experience with Google’s Keyword Tool5.	Perform ongoing keyword research including discovery and expansion, and optimization6.	Research and analyze competitor advertising links7.	Knowledge of ranking factors and search engine algorithms8.	Develop and implement link building strategy- Proven success in link building and viral strategies9.	Recommend changes to website architecture, content, linking and other factors to improve SEO positions for target keywords.10.	The ability to work with back-end SEO elements such as .htaccess, [url removed, login to view], metadata, site speed optimization, and related skills11.	The ability to deploy an effective local and long-tail search strategy- Research and implement search engine optimization recommendations12.	A deep understanding of mobile strategy and how it relates to SEO13.	A solid grasp of how blogging, press releases, social media, and related strategies go hand-in-hand with SEO14.	A background in creating reports showing web analytics data and site evaluations15.	An up-to-date, working knowledge of current, past, and projected trends in the SEO/SEM industry

We’re looking for a candidate who understands how to develop, execute and manage Facebook & Instagram ad campaigns.The ideal candidate is a detail oriented while also a creative marketer that’s constantly testing new ads, from target audiences, to ad copy to content. Since this is a manager level position, you should have demonstrated success in managing ad budgets, multiple ad account, various objectives and driven scalable conversions.Responsibilities:-Manage and execute upon day to day social media campaign strategy, budgets and optimizations-Conception, management and optimizations of all facebook ads-Continuous advancement of our account by using “State of the Art” marketing methods-Daily use of reporting, analytics, and trend tools for success monitoring-Stays informed on industry trends, developments and new opportunities
title: Facebook ads Manager II

title: Help with Recruitment

desc: Thank you for reading, we are Australia's leading Atlassian Gold Solution Partner, offering a variety of IT based services, seeking skilled people to join our team.Please let me know in the first line of your response, what colour the sky is where you are right now.Also in your response, please let us know your experience in each of the skill areas and what exposure you have had to clients like those listed on http://di.net.au.**** Skills and experience ****Your ability to write and speak fluently in English is a must for this work, we are building our team and several clients have requirements for Adwords management and auditing, keyword campaigns, analytics recommendations, landing pages, SEO and similar.You will be well regarded by knowing the latest analytics tools and being able to use them (Google Data Studio, SEMRush, Hotjar [heat map tracking] or other).It is important that more than setup adwords campaigns, you can self manage yourself and our client relationships, giving business recommendations on what you will be focusing on for the month, how the campaign performed, how to improve them and then doing the improvement.**** Workload and interacting with out staff ****Initially you will get 2-20 hours a week of work, leading to full-time.Ideally, we want to engage a company that has an Account Manager and relevant technical staff.You will be required to interact directly with our clients, responding to tickets within our Jira and Confluence system, also speaking to them on the phone as you do more work with us.If you are not familiar with Jira, Confluence and BitBucket (our code repository), it is our Atlassian Software Stack that we use as our Project Management system; we are open to teaching this if you have not used it, though prior experience would be very valuable.**** Performance payment ****We are happy to provide up to 40% of your monthly billing as a performance bonus, based on high quality work and timely response rates.You will be measured on -IRT (Initial Response Time) - how quickly you respond to tickets assigned to you in our project management systemORT (Overall Response Time) - how quickly things get resolved from start to finishQuality - are things accurate when delivered?  Do we need to ask you to redo work for containing spelling mistakes, missing elements or lacking attention to detail?Happy Customers - do we hear from customers they are happy with your work and interacting with you?**********Thank you for reading, please apply if you have solid skills that meet the criteria, can communicate well in English and want to receive regular, ongoing work.We look forward to getting underway as early as this week (October) as we have existing work waiting to be done.
title: Create/Manage PPC - SEO / SEM (Agency ideally) for ongoing work + performance bonus

desc: DM sm online working distribution network creation and awareness campaign
title: Create/Manage a  PPC Campaign
